title: Statistically Accurate Retributionist

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Every time someone dies, there is a 50% chance for two random players to be revived, prioritizing Town, then non-Town that can win with Town in some way, and finally all other roles.
- Every time __**you**__ die, at the start of the next day, ALL dead players have a 50% chance of being revived.
